game

Interface Character

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Ambusher, Chaser, Ghost, Ignorant, Waka, Whim

    public interface Character
    Interface defining standard methods for the Waka and ghosts characters of the game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeSprite()
      Change the character's sprite given its current attributes.
      void draw(App app, Game game)
      Draws all aspects of the character to the screen.
      void reset()
      Reset the character's attributes to what they were at instantiation.
      void setSpeed(int xVelocity, int yVelocity)
      Compact method to change the current speed of the character.
      void tick(App app, Game game)
      Conduct all character functionalities and update character attributes.

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        void tick(App app,
          Game game)
        Conduct all character functionalities and update character attributes.
        Parameters:
        app - The App object
        game - The Game object

      • draw

        void draw(App app,
          Game game)
        Draws all aspects of the character to the screen.
        Parameters:
        app - The App object.
        game - The game object.

      • setSpeed

        void setSpeed(int xVelocity,
              int yVelocity)
        Compact method to change the current speed of the character.
        Parameters:
        xVelocity - The new velocity in the x direction
        yVelocity - The new velocity in the y direction

      • changeSprite

        void changeSprite()
        Change the character's sprite given its current attributes.

      • reset

        void reset()
        Reset the character's attributes to what they were at instantiation.
